{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=DGN2200 |revision=v3 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/17/2011 |manuf_country=China |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=PY311200167 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63281 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND256W3A2BN6 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQD-25H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43227 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=2C:B0:5D |oui_eth=2C:B0:5D }} ''N300 Wireless ADSL2+ Modem Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=DGN2200v3|vs_id=19722}} OEM SerComm (AAQ00C-1.6) [http://neclub.netgear.com.cn/nebs/ShowPost.asp?ThreadID=2844&SortOrder=1 Large internal images of the board on '''netgear.com.cn'''] :AAQ00D-1.6 is silkscreened on the board :BCM63281TKFBG SoC The default SSID pattern for this device appears to be '''NETGEARXX'''.
